Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the citywide percentage of rental units in projects receiving city financial assistance that must be 2- and 3-bedroom units
Items.MatterName: Citywide percentage of rental units in projects receiving city financial assistance that must be 2- and 3-bedroom units.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the maximum citywide percentage of studio apartments in city-funded projects to construct rental units for older adults
Items.MatterName: Maximum citywide percentage of studio apartments in city-funded projects to construct rental units for older adults.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the citywide percentage of rental units in projects receiving city financial assistance that must be affordable for extremely low-income and very low-income households
Items.MatterName: Citywide percentage of rental units in projects receiving city financial assistance that must be affordable for extremely low-income and very low-income households.
